executable.title: Rigid and affine registration
executable.description: This program performs rigid and affine image registration using multi-resolution optimization of voxel-based image similarity measures.
executable.contributor: Torsten Rohlfing, Michael P. Hasak, Greg Jefferis, Calvin R. Maurer, Daniel B. Russakoff
executable.acknowledgements: CMTK is supported by the National Institute of Biomedical Imaging and BioEngineering under Grant EB008381

integer.description: Automatic optimization and resolution parameter generation for <n> levels
integer.name: auto_multi_levels
integer.label: auto_multi_levels

double.description: Factor for search step size reduction. Must be > 0.0 and < 1.0
double.name: stepfactor
double.label: stepfactor

double.description: Optional threshold to terminate optimization (level) if relative change of target function drops below this value.
double.name: delta_f_threshold
double.label: delta_f_threshold

double.description: Upper limit for image sampling in multiresolution hierarchy
double.name: coarsest
double.label: coarsest

boolean.description: Do not use original data in full resolution, omit final stage in multiresolution hierarchy, thus reducing computation time.
boolean.name: omit_original_data
boolean.label: omit_original_data

integer-vector.description: Add number of degrees of freedom [can be repeated]
integer-vector.name: dofs
integer-vector.label: dofs

integer-vector.description: Add number of degrees of freedom for final level only [can be repeated]
integer-vector.name: dofs_final
integer-vector.label: dofs_final

boolean.description: Do not auto-switch reference and floating image for improved computational performance
boolean.name: no_switch
boolean.label: no_switch

boolean.description: Initialized transformation by translating floating image FOV center onto reference image FOV center
boolean.name: initxlate
boolean.label: initxlate

boolean.description: Invert initial transformation before initializing registration
boolean.name: initial_is_inverse
boolean.label: initial_is_inverse

string-enumeration.description: Registration metric for motion estimation by image-to-image registration.
string-enumeration.name: registration_metric
string-enumeration.label: registration_metric

boolean.description: Match floating image histogram to reference image histogram.
boolean.name: match_histograms
boolean.label: match_histograms

transform.description: Output path for final transformation in ITK format
transform.name: out_itk
transform.label: out_itk

string.description: Path to image/transformation database that should be updated with the new registration and/or reformatted image.
string.name: db
string.label: db
